'''Ranging Rainbow''' is [[Gaming]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
Gaming's hair is up in a half ponytail, with the top section brown and the bottom a deep scarlet. 

Gaming sports a reddish-orange top with metal clippings of silver on the collar, and baggy dark grey pants with golden engravings resembling that of Wushou lion designs. His jacket has a hoodie with a Wushou lion design and golden and green rims with tether-like drawstings. He has a green scarf draped around his hip with his {{Pyro}} [[Vision]] and a tiny metal Wushou lion trinket. He has a metal choker of sorts sitting on his collarbone. He has black and gold flat shoes, and black fingerless gloves with a red string wrapped around the wrists.
